description: The Sealant Passport represents the needs from manufacturers of chemical substance and mixtures. It describes data required by the safety data sheet (SDS) - which is based on the REACH Regulation No 1907/2006 in the format of a DPP.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Maximum title characters set to 60.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Entity encapsulating the details from the documents title and location.

documentTitle.description: The header or title of the document.

documentLocation.description: Location or link of and to the document.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Connects the title and location of the document.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property containing a language according to ISO 639-1, for example "de".

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Refers to the version of the safety data sheet (SDS) document.
Length of the text is capped to three letters based on the ISO 3166 standard.
Entity encapsulating the required information.

indicationChanges.description: in the case of a revised safety data sheet (SDS), a clear indication of where changes have been made to the previous version of the safety data sheet (SDS).

authorSDS.description: safety data sheet (SDS) author changing the document.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Describes additional information, in a set of values.
Entity encapsulating the details from the safety data sheet (SDS) documentation.

documentLanguage.description: Language of the safety data sheet (SDS) document.

provisioningCountry.description: The country from where the documentation is issued from.

documentLocation.description: Location or link of and to the document.

otherInformation.description: Additional information relevant to the safety data sheet (SDS) document.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Connects the safety data sheet (SDS) version, language, and country.
Set of documents containing the description of chemical substances and mixture components.

declarationOfConformity.description: Declaration of conformity (CE) is describing a regulatory requirement from the EU.

removalProcedure.description: The documents explain the removal and possible recycling options of the product.

dueDiligence.description: Report on supply chain due diligence policies. Link to document or website on its supply chain due diligence policies.

technicalDocumentation.description: Technical documentation refers to documents that explain the use, functionality, creation, or architecture of the product.

safetyDataSheet.description: A link to the full seafty data sheet of the material. A link to a SDS might be provided for several countries and possibly multiple languages for each country. The table includes: version, country name, language of the document and the link to the document. The documents should preferably be provided as PDF or Word document.

sustainabilityReport.description: Link to public website or document. Reporting in accordance with the new European Sustainability Reporting Standards (ESRS) including the new ESG reporting standards.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Time in seconds needed for the curing of the substance or mixture.
Set of measures linked to the performance and durability of the mixtures and substances.

curingTime.description: Cure time is the time that determines how long it will take for the material to fully cure. A number of chemical reactions occur during this time, for the material to harden. It can take a long time for a material to fully cure.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Describes the regex expression for the Reach Registration number. Constraints the value to two digits followed by an - followed by ten digits followed by an - followed by two digits followed by an - and four digits.

urn_samm_io.catenax.serial_part_typizati.description:
The key characteristic of a local identifier. A specific subset of keys is predefined, but additionally any other custom key is allowed. Predefined keys (to be used when applicable):
- "manufacturerId" - The Business Partner Number (BPN) of the manufacturer. Value: BPN-Nummer
- "partInstanceId" - The identifier of the manufacturer for the serialized instance of the part, e.g. the serial number
- "batchId" - The identifier of the batch, to which the serialzed part belongs
- "van" - The anonymized vehicle identification number (VIN). Value: anonymized VIN according to OEM anonymization rules. Note: If the key "van" is available, "partInstanceId" must also be available and hold the identical value.
A list of key value pairs for local identifiers, which are composed of a key and a corresponding value.

key.description: The key of a local identifier.

urn_samm_io.catenax.serial_part_typizati.description: A single serialized part may have multiple attributes, that uniquely identify a that part in a specific dataspace (e.g. the manufacturer`s dataspace)

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Describes the Regex expression for the CAS number. Constraints the value to four digits followed by an - followed by two digits followed by an - and one digit.
Describes the regex expression for the EC number. Constraints the value to three digits followed by an - followed by three digits followed by an - and one digit.

Describes the regex expression for the Index number. Constraints the value to three digits followed by an - followed by three digits followed by an - followed by two digits followed by an - and one digit.
Set of information to identify the product.

tradeName.description: Trade name given to the chemical substance or mixture as part of the product identification.

productCode.description: Product Code given to the Substance/mixture as part of the product identification.

reachRegistration.description: A REACH registration number is an 18-digit number assigned by the European Chemicals Agency (ECHA).

localIdentifiers.description: A local identifier enables identification of a part in a specific data space, but is not unique in Catena-X data space. Multiple local identifiers may exist.

casNumber.description: A CAS registry number is a unique identification number assigned by the Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS).

ecNumber.description: The European Commission number (EC number), is the code assigned to chemical substances that are commercially available within the European Union.

indexNumber.description: The index number is used as an identifier.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Set of information referring to the application of the substance and mixture.

usage.description: Brief description of the identified uses of the substance or mixture relevant for the recipient(s).

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Constraint to allow only numbers, blanks and an optional leading + sign.
Set of information to identify the supplier.

emergencyNumber.description: Suppliers emergency telephone number for information services.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Describes chemical distribution in percentage. It can include a percentage range. Either 10% or 5.5%-6% . Allowed are decimal values with a dot as separator. Mandatory are no spaces between the values and the percentage character.
Entity encapsulating the ingredients.

chemicalPercentage.description: Describes chemical distribution in percentage. It can include a percentage range. Either 10% or 5,5%-6% . Allowed are decimal values with a "," separator. Mandatory are no spaces between the values and the percentage character.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Describes the amount of each individual chemical.
Set of information to identify the hazards.

classificationGHS.description: The classification of the substance or the mixture which results from the application of the classification criteria in Regulation (EC) No 1272/2008 shall be given.

possibleHazards.description: A description of the various toxicological (health) effects and the available data used to identify those effects (SDS Section 11.1).

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Entity encapsulating the chemical composition and nature.

composition.description: Describes the chemical identity of the ingredient(s) of the substance or mixture.

chemicalNature.description: Chemical nature of the mixture or substance.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Characteristic combining the chemical composition for a mixture and a substance.
Set of information displaying the product composition.
Set of information referring to safety measures.

firstAid.description: First aid instructions are provided by relevant routes of exposure (SDS Section 4.1).

fireExtinguisher.description: Suitable extinguishing media,  for fighting a fire caused by the substance or mixture, or arising in its vicinity (SDS Section 5.1).

personalPrecaution.description: Information about the appropriate response to spills, leaks, or releases, to prevent or minimize the adverse effects on persons, property and the environment (SDS Section 6.1).

technicalMeasures.description: Information is provided concerning protective measures for safe handling and recommended technical measures (SDS Section 7.1).

exposureLimit.description: Information about the applicable exposure limits of the substances and mixtures (SDS Section 8.1).

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Enumeration with three physical states: gas, liquid and solid.
Provides a range or a pH value.
The temperature in its phase.
Describes the density of the product.
Set of information describing the physical and chemical properties.

physicalState.description: Describes the physical state (gas, liquid or solid) at standard conditions of temperature and pressure.

colour.description: The colour of the substance or mixture as supplied is indicated.

odour.description: A qualitative description of the odour is shown if it is well-known or described in the literature.

pH.description: The pH of the substance or mixture as supplied, or where the product is a solid, the pH of an aqueous liquid or solution at a given concentration, shall be indicated.

phaseTransition.description: Phase Transition temperature from liquid to gas.

flashPoint.description: For mixtures, a value for the mixture shall be indicated, if available. Otherwise, the flash point of the substance with the lowest flash point shall be indicated.

density.description: Density and relative density shall generally be indicated at standard conditions of temperature and pressure.

reactivity.description: Reactivity hazards of the substance or mixtures.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Set of information describing the proper disposal of the product.

wasteManagement.description: Waste management of the substance or mixture and/or its container to assist in the determination of safe and environmentally preferred waste management options.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Set of information describing the transport information.

unNumber.description: The UN number or the ID number (i.e. the four-figure identification number of the substance, mixture or article preceded by the letters ‘UN’ or ‘ID’) from the UN Model Regulations, IMDG, ADR, RID, ADN or ICAO TI shall be provided.

dgClass.description: The transport hazard class (and subsidiary risks) assigned to the substances or mixtures on the basis of the predominant hazard that they present according to the UN Model Regulations shall be provided.

dgPack.description: The packing group number from the UN Model Regulations shall be provided, if applicable, as required by the UN Model Regulations, ADR, RID and ADN.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Set of information regarding the regulations.

limitations.description: Information shall be provided regarding relevant Union safety, health and environmental provisions including the prohibitions and restrictions.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Describes the amount of kg of the CO2 equivalent.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_3.0.0_CrossSecto.description: Characteristic for defining the enumeration of valid accounting standards used for product carbon footprint calculation as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.
Entity for defining an accounting standard used for product carbon footprint calculation as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

crossSectoralStandard.description: Discloses a cross-sectoral standard applied for calculating or allocating GHG (Greenhouse Gas) emissions as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_3.0.0_CrossSecto.description: Characteristic for defining the list of valid accounting standards used for product carbon footprint calculation as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_3.0.0_ProductOrS.description: Enumeration of PCR (Product Category Rule) operators as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_3.0.0_RuleNamesT.description: Constraint for defining a non-empty set of non-empty rule names as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

items.description: String that contains at least one character.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_3.0.0_ProductOrS.description: Entity for defining the set of values for the product or sector specific rules of a product carbon footprint as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

operator.description: Operator of PCR (Product Category Rule)/ PSR (Product Specific Rule) as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

ruleNames.description: Product-specific or sector-specific set of rules used for calculating or allocating GHG (Greenhouse Gas) emissions applied from the specified operator. Property defined by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

otherOperatorName.description: Other operator of PCR (Product Category Rule)/ PSR (Product Specific Rule) as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_3.0.0_ProductOrS.description: Characteristic for defining the set of product or sector specific rules of a product carbon footprint as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

urn_samm_io.catenax.sealant.sealant_pass.description: Set of information needed for the carbon footprint ecodesign regulations.

co2FootprintTotal.description: The total carbon footprint, calculated as kg of carbon dioxide equivalent.

crossSectoralStandardsUsed.description: Discloses the cross-sectoral standards applied for calculating or allocating GHG (Greenhouse Gas) emissions as specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

productOrSectorSpecificRules.description: Product or sector specific rules applied for calculating or allocating GHG (Greenhouse Gas) emissions, e.g. PCRs (Product Category Rules), including operators or pubishers and according rule names. Specified by the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development) Pathfinder initiative.

documents.description: Set of documents containing the description of components.

performanceProperties.description: Describes the performance and durability of a substance or mixture.

productIdentification.description: Identification of the substance/mixture and of the company/undertaking.

application.description: Relevant identified uses of the substance or mixture and uses advised against.

supplier.description: Supplier of the mixture or substance.

hazardsIdentification.description: Describes the hazards of the substance or mixture and the appropriate warning information associated with those hazards.

safetyMeasure.description: Describes measures related to the safe handling of the mixtures and substances.

productProperties.description: Describes the physical and chemical properties of the substance or mixture.

productDisposal.description: Describes the proper disposal of the product.

carbonFootprint.description: Describes the carbon footprint of the substance or mixture based on the Ecodesign.
